snippet: The Democratic Party’s principles are worth trumpeting, but many are going unmentioned at its convention.
abstract: Editorial questions why the Democratic Party is not trumpeting many of the principles included in its party platform at the Democratic National Convention; warns that if Democrats do not start talking more about their fundamental principles, going beyond easy sound bites, they will lose voters who are hoping for more.
lead_paragraph: The Democratic Party’s principles are worth trumpeting, but many are going unmentioned at its convention.

headline.seo: Words Not Spoken by the Democrats
